column4: 18-8  医療保険 (2) 国民健康保険 a 適用状況 (平成27～29年度末) 18-8  HEALTH INSURANCE (2) NATIONAL HEALTH INSURANCE a COVERAGE ( End of Fiscal Years 2015-2017 )
a) Associations  b) (Relisted) Non-Tokyo residents  c) General/retired  d) Retired insured persons, etc.
注 1) 加入率＝（被保険者公営／翌年度4月1日の住民基本台帳による人口）×100

Note: 1) The enrollment rate is calculated by dividing the number of publically insured persons by the population registered in the Basic Resident Registers as of April 1 of the following fiscal year, and multiplying this by 100.
資料：都福祉保健局総務部総務課 「福祉・衛生統計年報」 Source: Bureau of Social Welfare and Public Health, TMG
